name: LUCKY BAMBOO PLANT
description:
Lucky Bamboo Towers 
Two tier lucky bamboo submerged in a wonderful & beautiful magic gel

Specifications:
Bamboo is a live plant is 8 1/2 inches tall x 2 inches wide is 2 tower
1 st tier has 7 canes > luky 7
2nd tier has 14 canes > 2 times lucky
vase 4 1/2 in x 5 in
magic gell around 2 cups of gell
all together is 11 inches tall

Care and use:
Rinse the bamboo every week ½ no more than 2 weeks without rinse,clean the vase, and the magic gel only with water, you can do this in a strainer, put them back clean with no water so the magic gel can mantain shape. 

This set includes:
1 st tier has 7 canes
2nd tier has 14 canes
1 Vase
1 Extra magic gel bag

( FREE !!! FREE !!! SHIPPING WITH YOUR ORDER )

Shipping and handling:
We ship only to United States  
We packaged your lucky bamboo stems separately from pots or vases to protect them during shipping. Please remove the protective wrapping from your bamboo but do not remove twist ties, if any. It is important to keep roots moist or in water at all times so put your stems or arrangements in a vase or tray of water if you’re not ready to put them in their new home right away.
